name: Tunnel Vision (Foresight Interactive, TheManiacZach, Calzones(lightning), NullGameExc)
name_original: Tunnel Vision (Foresight Interactive, TheManiacZach, Calzones(lightning), NullGameExc)
description: "I met this girl a little while ago, and I've enjoyed our times together. We seem to have a lot in common, which is awesome! Recently, during one of our chats, she asked if I could come over and hang out with her and gave me her address. Now that I'm here, I'll say the tower is a bit excessive, but I'll take it."
